casebody.data:
2002-1861 (La. 10/14/02)

C. TODD CORPORATION v. Linda CIMO, Administratrix of the Succession of Joseph H. Cimo; Laura Cimo Russo, Individually and as the Surviving Administratrix of the Succession of Lucy Cimo; Laura Cimo, aka Laura Cimo Russo, et al. No. 2002-C-1861. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 14, 2002.

*426In re C. Todd Corporation; — Plaintiff; Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review, Parish of Orleans, Civil District Court Div. G, No. 95-03737; to the Court of Appeal, Fourth Circuit, No. 2002-CA-0071.

Denied.
